channel.title: Snark covered in acid...
channel.description: When bullsquid hits you with acid while you hold a snark, it will be covered in acid. Maybe it should have a dying animation in such situation, and Freeman drops its dead body?

item.title: Snark covered in acid...
item.dc:creator: Zen609
item.description:
Before you make a thread, ask yourself:

  1. Is there an existing thread for this topic or a more general thread where my specific comment would fit?

  2. Is the topic of my thread significant or interesting enough that it will generate discussion? Does it need itâ€™s own thread?
